attributes.title: Denim Jeans
attributes.description:
Created on April 7, 2010 by jenniferksharpe on Sourcemap.org:

This is a test map, based on some preliminary research of the denim life-cycle, testing the steps of making a sourcemap for an item of clothing.

attributes.name: Denim Jeans
attributes.title: Denim Jeans
attributes.description: This is a test map, based on some preliminary research of the denim life-cycle, testing the steps of making a sourcemap for an item of clothing.

attributes.name: Cotton
attributes.title: Cotton
attributes.description:
Raw material grown here. 
Agriculture Inputs: Planting, fertilizing, cultivating, picking
Water
Energy
Labour

attributes.name: Cotton finishing
attributes.title: Cotton finishing
attributes.description: The raw cotton is put through a finishing process, where impurities are removed.

attributes.name: Yarn
attributes.title: Yarn
attributes.description: Once impurities have been removed, the cotton is shipped to Malaysia to be spun into yarn.

attributes.name: Weaving- Fabric
attributes.title: Weaving- Fabric
attributes.description: Once made into yarn, it travels to Thailand to be woven into fabric.

attributes.name: Cutting
attributes.title: Cutting
attributes.description: The fabric is then sent to Singapore to be cut

attributes.name: Sewing
attributes.title: Sewing
attributes.description: Once cut, the pieces are sent to Indonesia to be sewn, and assembled.

attributes.name: Zippers
attributes.title: Zippers
attributes.description: Zippers come from Hong Kong, shipped to Indonesia for assembly.

attributes.name: Thread
attributes.title: Thread
attributes.description: The thread is shipped to Indonesia for sewing.

attributes.name: Buttons & Rivets
attributes.title: Buttons & Rivets
attributes.description: Buttons and rivets are shipped to Indonesia for assembly.

attributes.name: Embroidery
attributes.title: Embroidery
attributes.description: The embroidery is shipped from Singapore to Indonesia for assembly.

attributes.name: Labels
attributes.title: Labels
attributes.description: The labels for the jeans are shipped in from India.

attributes.name: Branding & Inspection
attributes.title: Branding & Inspection
attributes.description: Once the jeans are assembled in Indonesia, they are shipped to Singapore for final branding and inspection, before being shipped to different markets all over the globe.
